text: Matriarchy is a social organization where the mother or oldest female heads a family or social group.Encyclopedia of Psychology and Religion: L-Z, ed. David A. Leeming; Kathryn Madden; Stanton Marlan (Berlin: Springer VS, 2008), p. 552 Descent and relationships are decided through the female line. == References == Category:Relationships Category:Sociology
title: Matriarchy
